page.title: 08Denby School - l913
page.content: The school was built in 1865. In l913 there were {110 pupils }in the school. They were divided into three classes with three teachers. The infants' class standards 1,2 3, and 4 and the Headteacher was Mr.Jelfs. He lived next door to the school. The children's started school at five and left when they were 14. When they were {13 years old}they went to the{mills in {Denby Dale}for half the week and stayed in school for the other half. Some children left the school at 11 to go to Penistone Grammar School. A lot of children came from Ingbirchworth Village as there was no school there. There were{no school dinners}so the children brought a packed lunch or went home. The boys played in the top yard and the girls in the bottom yard, separated by a gate.
